snippet: Max White hit a run-scoring triple in a two-run 12th inning for Oklahoma, lifting the Sooners past Connecticut, 5-3, in an N.C.A.A. regional game in Blacksburg, Va.
abstract: Oklahoma men's baseball team beats Connecticut, 5-3, in an NCAA regional game to advance in the winner's bracket of the double-elimination regional.
lead_paragraph: Max White hit a run-scoring triple in a two-run 12th inning for Oklahoma, lifting the Sooners past Connecticut, 5-3, in an N.C.A.A. regional game in Blacksburg, Va.
